snippet: House Republicans propose gutting the agencies designed to prevent economic meltdowns like the Great Recession in 2007.
abstract: Editorial criticizes House Republicans for proposing to gut the federal agencies designed to prevent economic meltdowns like the Great Recession of 2007; observes that the proposed cuts are the latest in a long series of efforts by Republicans to keep the government from tempering even the most economically dangerous desires of business.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans propose gutting the agencies designed to prevent economic meltdowns like the Great Recession in 2007.

headline.seo: Lost the Vote? Deny the Money
